Posts.Content: jheat wrote: I am 39 and yesterday my husband felt a lump in my breast, I rant the doctor immediately and went to see him that morning, they felt a lump in my right breast about 3cm x 1cm, my appointment to see the specialist is not for two weeks, I don't think i can wait that long.  Everyone keeps saying I'll be fine, but I feel that if I go on as if nothing is wrong and I find out there is, I won't be able to cope.  We have three children 15 (on a scholarship at boarding school), 10 and 9.  I can't get dark thoughts out of my head and be postitive.  Can anyone tell me anything about sizes of lumps etc, if it helps apparently it is positioned at 10 o'clock.  I have no history on my maternal side but on my paternal side two of my grandmothers sisters died of breast cancer.  I think I am going crazy and don't know what to do. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Not Diagnosed but so worried jheat cycle-path

Posts.Content: Jan 20, 2012 04:26PM jheat wrote: Hi, thanks for the replies.  No I have not seen the specialist yet, just my doctor, who in the report for the radiology as said that it is about 3cm x 1 cm and at ten o'clock.  I can't be seen in quicker as where I live in NZ, the specialist only comes once a week, I have tried to get in out of town but will only quicken it by two days.  Just so up and down.
Posts.Title: Not Diagnosed but so worried jheat cycle-path

Posts.Content: Jan 20, 2012 10:12PM jheat wrote: Thank you much, its nice being in contact with people giving positive feedback, people that understand me.  I will let you know how I go.  Having a good day today, keeping myself busy.  Yes I am in New Zealand, and I live at a beautiful beach so everytime I feel a bit down, I go down to the beach, its summer here, so that takes my mind off things.  Thank you all once again.
Posts.Title: Not Diagnosed but so worried jheat cycle-path

Posts.Content: Jan 20, 2012 10:13PM jheat wrote: One other quick thing, Im sure every now and then I feel a little throbbing in my right breast, and to be quite honest, I keep thinking, is this in my head, because surely I would have felt it, then I think that I have been feeling it for a while off and on.  Is this normal.
